The fourth season of 'American Idol' premiered on January 18, 2005 and continued
until May 25, 2005. It was hosted by Ryan Seacrest. Randy Jackson, Paula Abdul
and Simon Cowell also returned to judge. Carrie Underwood won the season with
approximately 500Â million votes cast in the season and 37 million for the
finale. Underwood has since gone on to become a six-time Grammy-winning country
megastar. This is the last season to be aired in standard definition.
headings: Contestants who appeared on other shows
